ExampleDefinition.Title: RealTime Series-Values
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: This shows the SeriesValueModifier applied to a real-time chart, to display the latest value of a series on the YAxis with an AxisMarkerAnnotation.
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Realtime Series=Values</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">This shows the SeriesValueModifier applied to a real-time chart, to display the latest value of a series on the YAxis with an AxisMarkerAnnotation.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Tip!</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic">By default AxisMarkerAnnotations bind to the SeriesColor, IsVisible and AxisId properties of the RenderableSeries. You can override the style via the SeriesValueModifier.AxisMarkerStyle property</Run>
